name: oai2lmapi
displayName: OpenAI to Language Model API Bridge
description: Connect OpenAI-compatible APIs to VSCode's Language Model API for Copilot

languageModelChatProviders.displayName: OpenAI to Language Model API Bridge
Gemini to Language Model API Bridge

oai2lmapi.apiKey.description: DEPRECATED: API key is now stored securely. Use the 'OAI2LMApi: Set API Key' command instead. Any value here will be migrated automatically.
oai2lmapi.apiKey.deprecationMessage: API key is now stored securely using VSCode's SecretStorage. Use the 'OAI2LMApi: Set API Key' command to set your API key.

oai2lmapi.autoLoadModels.description: Automatically load models from API on startup

oai2lmapi.showModelsWithoutToolCalling.description: Show models that do not support tool/function calling. By default, only models with tool calling support are displayed.

oai2lmapi.suppressChainOfThought.description: Suppress chain-of-thought transmission: strips leading <think>...</think> blocks and does not forward reasoning_content/reasoning/thinking fields. <thinking>...</thinking> blocks are still forwarded as thinking.

oai2lmapi.enableGeminiChannel.description: Enable the Gemini channel provider. When disabled, only the OpenAI-compatible provider is active.

oai2lmapi.geminiApiEndpoint.description: Google Gemini API endpoint URL (without version suffix)

oai2lmapi.modelOverrides.description: Per-model configuration overrides. Keys are model name patterns (supports wildcards like 'gemini-*'), values are objects with optional: maxInputTokens, maxOutputTokens, supportsToolCalling, supportsImageInput, temperature, thinkingLevel (number for budget, or 'low'/'medium'/'high'/'auto'), usePromptBasedToolCalling (boolean to use XML-based prompt engineering for tool calling), suppressChainOfThought (boolean to suppress chain-of-thought transmission for matching models).

maxInputTokens.description: Override max input tokens for matching models

maxOutputTokens.description: Override max output tokens for matching models

supportsToolCalling.description: Override tool calling support for matching models

supportsImageInput.description: Override image input support for matching models

thinkingLevel.description: Thinking level: number for token budget, or 'low'/'medium'/'high'/'auto'/'none'

usePromptBasedToolCalling.description: When enabled, tools are converted to XML-format instructions in the system prompt instead of using native function calling. Useful for models that don't support native tool calling.

suppressChainOfThought.description: Override oai2lmapi.suppressChainOfThought for matching models. When true, strips leading <think>...</think> blocks and does not forward reasoning_content/reasoning/thinking fields. <thinking>...</thinking> blocks are still forwarded as thinking.

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile:tests && pnpm run lint
